text: Our biggest concern is that the TB wards are perpetuating the spread of infection . The management promised us that they will build new TB wards that are well ventilated , that have good airflow , fans and regularly serviced UV lights as well as big windows and patients ' waiting area to allow airflow . The wards will have nursing station and there will be a demarcation between TB , MDR - TB and XDR - TB . We really need those wards because we are not safe here . "
